mods.abstract: The ground breaking ceremony for Rozier Hall was quite an occasion. The opening prayer and the blessing of the site were led by Joseph A. Durick, Bishop of Nashville. Other members of the platform were President Brother Luke M. Grande; Brother Lambert Thomas, Provincial Superior of the Christian Brothers, Mel O' Brien, architect; Brother Edmund Whaley, director of development and emcee of the event.

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
